s.text: Neighborhood delis ran out of flowers, and NYPD officers were telling onlookers to "say a prayer and move it along, please."

Neighborhood delis ran out of flowers, and NYPD officers were telling onlookers to "say a prayer and move it along, please."
By late last week, the scene at 20 N. Moore St. matched its televised accounts.
What had appeared in person to be a loose gathering now looked like the altar of a Mexican church on All Saints' Day.
